DataElement.preferredName: Prior Registration Screening Patient Clinical Trial Ineligibility Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date a patient or participant was deemed ineligible for participation on a clinical trial by preregistration screening or assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prior Registration Screening Patient Clinical Trial Ineligibility
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a patient or participant being disqualified by law, rule, or provision from participating in a clinical trial by a systematic examination or assessment performed before registration or enrollment.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Registration; the act of enrolling.:A systematic examination or assessment.:A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

Concepts.definition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.
The state or quality of being disqualified by law, rule, or provision.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
